name: Step / Movement
description: Move your herder along the path. You must follow arrows.

name: Certificate
description: Increases the value of your wool during delivery. Can be temporary (0 cost) or permanent.

name: Gold
description: Used to buy cards/upgrades. Tracked on the player board.

name: Cycle / Draw-Discard
description: Draw X cards from your deck, then discard X cards from your hand.

name: Sheep Card
description: Primary resource. distinct types are needed for Wellington delivery. Breeding value determines income.
